learning_objectives.objective_title: definitions of the factors of production and their rewards
learning_objectives.guidance: Definitions and examples of land, labour, capital and enterprise. Examples of the nature of each factor of production.

learning_objectives.objective_title: mobility of the factors of production
learning_objectives.guidance: The influences on the mobility of the various factors.

learning_objectives.objective_title: quantity and quality of the factors of production
learning_objectives.guidance: The causes of changes in the quantity and quality of the various factors.
